title: Conspiracies, Theories & Truth E-Book Collection
description:
G'Day, There are those of us who believe in conspiracies and the existence
of a World Order that flies beneath the radar. There are those who seek truth
at any cost. Sometimes you have to go through a lot of dirt to get to the gold.
This collection of works is from 11 years browsing the internet. I have
kept the authours in the pdf because if it not were for them this collection
would not be here. All Kudos to them.

We live in an age where we are under constant surveillance, where all of our
history is contained in a data collection point, and history is trying to be re-written.
The net is simply a mass database that can be accessed from around the globe.
I firmly believe that the days of free internet are numbered; censorship will
be applied by the full force of our governments. Sites like these will be targeted
as much valuable information for the masses is needed to understand this new age
we are living in and the forces we are up against. Knowing the truth is like
finding a needle in a haystack. Hopefully there are many needles in this collection.

Fear is one of the biggest tools of choice if you are not ignorant of the facts.
Jesus came to remove our fears. He is real. The history is trying to remove Him from
all facets of reality. He is our ultimate reality in these days of doubt. If you
view these files in the foreknowledge that Christ is there beside you there will be
no fear.
